item.title: What is [[nodiscard]] and why it is usefull.
item.description: What is [[nodiscard]]? [[nodiscard]] is another attribute that has been added into C++ in the C++17 version. If you don’t know what attributes are you can find the details on the reference page but putting it simply they are things that you can annotate types, functions and other things with and thus provide some additional information to the compiler. [[nodiscard]] can be applied, in particular to function, enum and class declarations.
